issue.title: Increase number of iterations in VRC worlds

content.raw: Just to be clear. Iters = 40 with no hands is not the same as iters = 40 with a fully functional pair of hands and with objects such as rubble. When you tested the BDI controller, did it have hands and rubble? The test needs to be done in the VRC environments.
content.html: Just to be clear. Iters = 40 with no hands is not the same as iters = 40 with a fully functional pair of hands and with objects such as rubble. When you tested the BDI controller, did it have hands and rubble? The test needs to be done in the VRC environments.
